Docs.summary: イベント識別子を取得します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 If a client has added event handlers for more than one event using the same <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventHandler> instance, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs.EventId%2A> can be used to identify the event that the delegate should process.
## 例 In the following example, the event handler checks the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs.EventId%2A> of the event and handles the event accordingly.
[!code-csharp[UIAClient\_snip\#173](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#173)] [!code-vb[UIAClient\_snip\#173](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#173)]
